detectors.description: Variable SpeedFinance._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpeedFinance.sol#39) is not in mixedCase

detectors.description:

	- SpeedFinance.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpeedFinance.sol#63-65)

	- SpeedFinance.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpeedFinance.sol#67-69)

	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpeedFinance.sol#11)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- SpeedFinance.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpeedFinance.sol#71-75)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
